title: Dont get it.
body:
Why dodging blind picks gives you such high waiting times?

Im not willing to play double jungle because someone cant fucking read.

replies.body:
An excessive amount of dodging creates a negative experience for others, which is why if a trend of dodging occurs, you can incur queue-dodge timers or LP loss in the instance of ranked matches. I definitely recommend checking out the [Queue Dodge FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) if you'd like more information on this system.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

This is to prevent games from taking forever to start. If someone could dodge with no penalty then there would be a ton of dodging. You can check out more info about queue dodging penalties here: http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Queue_dodging
